title: Conferences
text:
Paper Presentations


Paper presentation titled “Bridging the Divide: Addressing the Education and Skill Development Gap for Sustainable Tribal Development in Jharkhand” with Akanksha Swaroop at K.O.College, Gumla (Ranchi University), November 2023

Paper presentation titled “From Ancient Texts to Modern Practices: The Enduring Influence of Arthashastra on Economics and Governance” with Srishti Shalini at Doranda College, Doranda (Ranchi University), January 2025

title: Murli Manohar
text: I am a PhD candidate in Economics at Jawaharlal Nehru University, New Delhi, and serve as an Assistant Professor at Ranchi University, Ranchi (Jharkhand). Passionate about advancing economic research, my work primarily focuses on education, while I remain open to exploring diverse areas within the field of economics.
